v8:item.v8:content: List stocks context menu group service
Список запасы контекстное меню группа сервис

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CatalogCharacteristics.Owner AS ProductsAndServicesRef, CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.VATRate AS VATRate, CatalogCharacteristics.Ref AS CharacteristicRef, ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit, CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.MeasurementUnit) AS MeasurementUnit, ISNULL(CAST(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2)), 0) AS Price, CASE WHEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit REFS Catalog.UOM THEN ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) / ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor ELSE ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) END AS Balance, CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Reserve, CASE WHEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit REFS Catalog.UOM THEN (ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0)) / ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor ELSE ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) END AS Free FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics AS CatalogCharacteristics LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.CounterpartyProductsAndServicesPrices.SliceLast( &PricePeriod, CounterpartyPriceKind = &CounterpartyPriceKind AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Characteristic LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance( , Company = &Company AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryRemains ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryRemains.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryRemains.Characteristic LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND Characteristic <> VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryReserves ON CatalogCharacteristics.Owner = InventoryReserves.ProductsAndServices AND CatalogCharacteristics.Ref = InventoryReserves.Characteristic WHERE CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType) AND Not CatalogCharacteristics.Owner.IsFolder

SELECT InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit, InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.ProductsAndServices, InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.Characteristic, ISNULL(InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Balance, ISNULL(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Reserve, ISNULL(InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Free FROM AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance(, Company = &Company) AS InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryBalances ON InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.StructuralUnit = InventoryBalances.StructuralUnit AND InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.ProductsAndServices = InventoryBalances.ProductsAndServices AND InventoryInWarehousesOfBalance.Characteristic = InventoryBalances.Characteristic

SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.IsFolder THEN CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.DeletionMark THEN 13 ELSE 12 END ELSE -1 + CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.DeletionMark THEN 1 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 3 END END AS PictureIndex, CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref AS ProductsAndServicesRef, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef) AS CharacteristicRef, CASE WHEN CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType = VALUE(Enum.ProductsAndServicesTypes.Service) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsService, CatalogProductsAndServices.Parent AS Parent, CatalogProductsAndServices.Code, CatalogProductsAndServices.Description, CatalogProductsAndServices.SKU, ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit, CatalogProductsAndServices.MeasurementUnit) AS MeasurementUnit, CatalogProductsAndServices.BusinessActivity, CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesCategory, CatalogProductsAndServices.Vendor, CatalogProductsAndServices.Warehouse, CatalogProductsAndServices.ReplenishmentMethod, CatalogProductsAndServices.ReplenishmentDeadline, CatalogProductsAndServices.VATRate AS VATRate, CatalogProductsAndServices.InventoryGLAccount, CatalogProductsAndServices.ExpensesGLAccount, CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType, CatalogProductsAndServices.Cell, CatalogProductsAndServices.PriceGroup, CatalogProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics, CatalogProductsAndServices.UseBatches, CatalogProductsAndServices.Comment, CatalogProductsAndServices.CountryOfOrigin, ISNULL(CAST(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price * (&PriceKindCurrencyRate * &DocumentCurrencyMultiplicity) / (&DocumentCurrencyRate * &PriceKindCurrencyMultiplicity) AS NUMBER(15, 2)), 0) AS Price, CASE WHEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit REFS Catalog.UOM THEN ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) / ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor ELSE ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) END AS Balance, CASE WHEN ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Reserve, CASE WHEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit REFS Catalog.UOM THEN (ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0)) / ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor ELSE ISNULL(InventoryRemains.QuantityBalance, 0) - ISNULL(InventoryReserves.QuantityBalance, 0) END AS Free FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS CatalogProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.CounterpartyProductsAndServicesPrices.SliceLast( &PricePeriod, CounterpartyPriceKind = &CounterpartyPriceKind AND Characteristic = VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) AS ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.ProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryInWarehouses.Balance(, Company = &Company) AS InventoryRemains ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = InventoryRemains.ProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND StructuralUnit REFS Catalog.StructuralUnits AND CustomerOrder <> VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef)) AS InventoryReserves ON CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref = InventoryReserves.ProductsAndServices WHERE CatalogProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType) AND Not CatalogProductsAndServices.IsFolder
